> > The use of meta shortcode in the YAML
>
> Meta shortcode in YAML should work. Inline R code should not. So you could fill subtitle using shortcode (`meta` or `env`, or `var` for project with variables yml file). It should work with title to I believe.
>
> Did you try meta shortcode or other already ?
>
> ```
> ---
> title: "{{< meta my_title >}}"
> format: html
> ---
>
> Content
> ```
>
> then
>
> ```powershell
> quarto preview test.qmd --metadata my_title="filled"
> ```
>
> This is working for me
